 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִיא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 539</sup>] **verb** ==vomit up, spue out, disgorge== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡â°u***</u></abbr>, ***spit*** [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>Suppl.83</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vomit***; Ethiopic [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vomit***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle f.*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָאָה‎</span> [[Lev.18.28|Lev 18:28]], but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֫אָה‎</span> ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular ([[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Baen|Baen]]); ***Imperfect*** (**Qal** or **Hiph\`il**) 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּקֵא‎</span> [[Jonah.2.11|Jonah 2:11]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְקִיאֶנוּ‎</span> [[Job.20.15|Job 20:15]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקִיא‎</span> [[Lev.18.28|Lev 18:28]]; [[Lev.20.22|Lev 20:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּקִא‎</span> [[Lev.18.25|Lev 18:25]] 2 masculine singular Sf. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּקִיאֶנָּה‎</span> [[Prov.23.8|Prov 23:8]] **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** suffix consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲקֵאתוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.25.16|Prov 25:16]] all ***vomit up:*** — with accusative, literal [[Prov.23.8|Prov 23:8]]; [[Prov.25.16|Prov 25:16]]; [[Jonah.2.11|Jonah 2:11]] figurative of land casting out inhabitants [[Lev.18.25|Lev 18:25]]; [[Lev.18.28|Lev 18:28]] (twice in verse); [[Lev.20.22|Lev 20:22]] (all [[BDB#H|H]]); of ***disgorging*** riches [[Job.20.15|Job 20:15]]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָיָה‎</span>] **verb** ==vomit== (si vera lectio= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קיא‎</span>, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:76h»§ 76h</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii.1, 586</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּקֵיוּ‎</span>[[Jer.25.27|Jer 25:27]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וקוו‎</span>), be drunken ***and vomit*** (? error for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקִיאוּ‎</span>). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִיטוֺר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קטר‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִימָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִימוֺשׁ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִמּוֺשׂ‎</span>
